item.description:
Meet at the Exit 6 Welcome Center at 11am. See you there!

If you need more time to get there - call me at 603 320 9459 and I'll wait for you with lit and maps - whatever you will need.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet inside the Welcome Center to distribute literature and packets If you need more time to get there - call me at 603 320 9459 and I'll wait for you with lit and maps - whatever you will need. come on - one last time!
item.why: You'll have a great time, meet some fellow RP supports, and talk to undecided voters about Dr. Paul!
item.name: Canvassing in Nashua, NH
